author: ekoneil
msg: Implement support for partial data sets in the data grid.  This allows the data grid to render a data set of 10 items that might be items 1-10, 11-20, 101-110, and so on.  This supports the common scenarios where partial data sets are retrieved from a DB / web service.  Right now, this only supports partial data containing enough data for a single page, though it could be changed to support storing data for several pages.
For those interested, please give this a spin and try it out.  There are tests (samples!) included in this commit.

author: ekoneil
msg: Add an "update.web" target to copy changed files from web/ to the build directory.  This makes it possible to incrementally develop JSPs in the DRT webapp.

author: jmarino
msg: remove dependency on core; cleanup unit tests; add SpringComponentType; instantiate one instance of Spring application context; use Spring Resource to represent configuration location

author: taylor
msg: added a session resolver for completeness
not using class scoped session attributes as this didn't make sense to me
